A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everything that was done to the character of Luke Skywalker was an abomination.  Disney\, JJ Abrams and Rian Johnson have ruined this franchise.  This is not a zero sum game.  You do not have to prop up weak characters by destroying the original heroes.  I was a fan since 1977.  This drivel that passes for a plot kills it for me.
